description_txt: stated on May 25, 2011 in remarks on the Senate floor:
quote_txt: Says 11 percent of the nation’s fatal car crashes in 2009 were attributed to distracted driving.

description_txt: stated on June 7, 2011 in remarks to reporters:
quote_txt: Says tax revenue was lower than expected in May and "that's basically a clear indication the governor's counselors are probably right -- that we are still not out of the woods yet."

description_txt: stated on June 13, 2011 in the Republican primary presidential debate in Manchester, NH:
quote_txt: Muslims tried to use Sharia law to influence court decisions in New Jersey and Oklahoma

description_txt: stated on May 9, 2011 in a press release:
quote_txt: Says Ocean Spray is moving its Bordentown processing facility to Pennsylvania largely because of costs associated with the Regional Greenhouse Gas Initiative.

description_txt: stated on May 4, 2011 in a television ad:
quote_txt: "As soon as Chris Christie was governor, he gave tax cuts to millionaires."

description_txt: stated on June 7, 2011 in an appearance on the "Helen Glover ShowV:
quote_txt: "A couple of hundred American cities are infested by members of the Mexican cartels."
footer: By C. Eugene Emery Jr. • June 19, 2011

description_txt: stated on June 14, 2011 in a speech.:
quote_txt: "The tax on job creating businesses is 35 percent in the United States, second worst in the entire world."

description_txt: stated on June 3, 2011 in a legislative hearing:
quote_txt: The Medford Water Commission was fined $279,000 for dumping plain drinking water into a stream.

description_txt: stated on June 14, 2011 in a blog:
quote_txt: Says Allen West violated federal law by scuba diving with U.S. flag.

description_txt: stated on June 13, 2011 in a Republican presidential debate:
quote_txt: Says an alternative to Social Security that operates in Galveston County, Texas, has meant that participants will "retire with a whole lot more money" than under Social Security.

description_txt: stated on June 14, 2011 in a press conference.:
quote_txt: "We are number one in the world when it comes to energy resources. ... The Russians are second; Saudi Arabia is number three."

description_txt: stated on June 5, 2011 in an op-ed:
quote_txt: Says the state budget includes spending on commercials for Fortune 500 companies.

description_txt: stated on June 13, 2011 in an interview on Fox News:
quote_txt: "The president came in and campaigned against me 12 times."

description_txt: stated on April 19, 2011 in a press release:
quote_txt: "Creating 25 jobs in Umatilla County has the same impact as 500 jobs in the metro region."

description_txt: stated on May 25, 2011 in an interview:
quote_txt: "Do this research … watch how much crime picks up if you take away [football]."

description_txt: stated on May 20, 2011 in a speech at Princeton University:
quote_txt: Democratic tax hikes led $70 billion of wealth to leave New Jersey between 2004 and 2008, and mainly relocate to Florida, North Carolina, Virginia and Pennsylvania.

description_txt: stated on June 13, 2011 in a Republican presidential candidate debate in New Hampshire:
quote_txt: "Obamacare takes $500 billion out of Medicare and funds Obamacare."

description_txt: stated on June 16, 2011 in an appearance at a Tampa coffee shop:
quote_txt: "This is the slowest job recovery since Hoover."

description_txt: stated on June 2, 2011 in a statement at a committee meeting:
quote_txt: Milwaukee’s police chief can fire officers "for basically no cause."

description_txt: stated on June 10, 2011 in an Internet ad:
quote_txt: Says George LeMieux "falsely attacked Marco Rubio."

description_txt: stated on June 8, 2011 in U.S. Senate forum.:
quote_txt: Says he's signed a pledge not to raise taxes four times.

description_txt: stated on May 19, 2011 in a news release:
quote_txt: "The Democrat-led Senate has failed to pass a budget for 750 days ... Senate Democrats have neglected one of their most basic responsibilities."

description_txt: stated on April 26, 2011 in an opinion column:
quote_txt: "The Public Employee Retirement System is making more millionaires than the Oregon state lottery."

description_txt: stated on May 10, 2011 in a press release:
quote_txt: Gov. Chris Christie caused a 4.1 percent increase in property taxes in 2010, marking the highest increase since 2007.

description_txt: stated on June 13, 2011 in an appearance on a talk show:
quote_txt: "It’s just crazy that the government will ... make it illegal to use the old [incandescent] bulbs."

description_txt: stated on June 14, 2011 in his first speech on the U.S. Senate floor:
quote_txt: "Anywhere in the world, when someone uses a mobile phone, e-mail, the Internet or GPS, they are enjoying the benefits of the American miracle."

description_txt: stated on May 5, 2011 in a debate in South Carolina:
quote_txt: The Medicare drug program "resulted in the program coming in 40 percent under budget. ... And the reason it was, is because the design was right."

description_txt: stated on June 6, 2011 in a Republican presidential debate:
quote_txt: Says President Barack Obama "has put (up) a stop sign … against oil drilling, against any kind of exploration offshore or in Alaska."

description_txt: stated on May 15, 2011 in in an interview on NBC's "Meet the Press":
quote_txt: "A large number of the uninsured earn $75,000 or more a year."

description_txt: stated on June 10, 2011 in an Internet ad:
quote_txt: Says George LeMieux "even compared Marco Rubio to Barack Obama."
